snippet.title: PSX Longplay [150] Driver
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Stoneworld

Driver. Tanner is an infiltrated agent who try to catch some bad guy. All the game is about driving and escaping police (or other guys). I got a funny bug, civilian trying to catch me in one point of the game. I've finished the last mission in one try by pure luck... I've not so much skill and this last mission is a real pain !

Hope you guys enjoy it ! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
